ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Really cool corpse locating tip
ygData.msgSnippet: Our Eye of Zomm is pretty short duration, maybe 30 seconds.  Long enough to be really irritating (since I ve never figured out how to get unlocked from the Eye
ygData.messageBody:
Our Eye of Zomm is pretty short duration, maybe 30 seconds. Long enough to be really irritating (since
I've never figured out how to get unlocked from the Eye when I need to), but too short to be useful.
Besides, everyone I know kills Eyes on sight. There's something atavistically pleasant about killing
things with one blow, apparently.

Kenross Cantoforjado, 55 songs (finally), Innoruuk



Talies the Wanderer wrote:

> Actually, the more I think about it, the more I think this would actually
> be very handy. Never having used it, I don't know the duration of Eye of
> Zomm, but if it lasts long enough, then follow these steps:
> 1) Turn on song.
> 2) Summon Eye
> 3) Put Eye directly in front of you, facing directly away.
> 4) Move Eye in a straight line...
>
> It might not be so useful in tree-infested areas, though.
>
> Talies
>
> At 01:37 PM 12/28/00 -0800, you wrote:
> > >
> > >What about if you have a SS helm and summon the Eye of Zomm? Can you summon
> > >the Eye, turn on the corpse locating song, and then lead the person to their
> > >corpse with the Eye instead of going yourself? This could be useful in
> > >situations when you don't want to leave your party.
> >
> >Neat idea. I'd guess that this wouldn't work, but who knows. Any idea what
> >the duration is of Eye of Zomm from the helm? I know my magician's Eye of
> >Zomm has a very short duration. Not sure it'd stay around long enough to
> >help someone locate their corpse.
> >
> >---Windleaf
> >
> >
> >
> >Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
> >with the subject submissions.
>
>
> Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@... with the subject submissions.
